content: this pattern can be made in 2 sizes sizes based on my gauge and usage of a 6mm hook petite approx 27 inches in length pages 4-6 tall approx 30 inches in length pages 7-9 supplies needed medium weight yarn main color approx 650 yards 3 different accent colors of which you will need approx 250 yards each for the first 2 colors and approx 500 yards of the third color size 5mm or 6mm hook scissors yarn needle print friendly pdf available
